summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Domain Detail Panel component with all 6 required sections. All functionality working correctly with proper permission controls.
passed_tests: Domain Detail Panel opens when clicking 'Detail' button on domain row
Section 1 (Domain Overview) displays domain name, tier badge, brand, network, status badges correctly
Section 2 (SEO Configuration) shows current configuration values with proper permission-based edit access
Section 3 (Network Hierarchy) correctly shows parent/child domain relationships with current domain highlighted
Section 4 (Notes & Context) displays existing domain notes
Section 5 (Activity & History) shows creation and update timestamps
Section 6 (Actions/Danger Zone) properly hidden for viewer role - permission-based access control working
Panel close button (X) present in header and functional
External link icon working for domain navigation
Proper role-based UI rendering (edit features hidden for viewer role)
All data-testid attributes present for automated testing
Backend APIs serving data correctly (22 domains, 3 groups, 4 brands)

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All read operations successful, write operations properly restricted by permissions
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All UI components and interactions working correctly
